title: The death of John D. McAfee
content: John McAfee died in prison at age 75. It's pretty widely assumed that he was killed by the authorities holding him there, but it was ruled a suicide in court 2 years later. he was a father to 47 children, loved guns, loved minors (he was a libertarian so obviously he slept with minors), and loved drugs. and possibly selling drugs.
name: mcafee
